item.title: Effortless Crispy Orange Chicken
item.description: Craving a dish that's both crispy and packed with flavor? Discover our Effortless Crispy Orange Chicken recipe! This mouthwatering meal combines tender chicken with a zesty orange glaze that’s sure to please the whole family.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
  • 1/2 cup orange juice
  • 1/4 cup soy sauce
  • 2 tablespoons honey
  • 1 tablespoon cornstarch
  • 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix orange juice, soy sauce, honey, and cornstarch until well combined.
  2. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
  3. Season chicken pieces with salt and pepper, then add to the skillet.
  4. Cook chicken for about 5-7 minutes, turning occasionally until golden brown.
  5. Pour the orange sauce over the chicken and cook for an additional 5 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the chicken.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230383494 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pound #orange #sauce

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas
item.description: These Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas are a delicious and simple way to bring the family together for dinner. With tender shredded chicken, gooey cheese, and zesty enchilada sauce, this dish is sure to impress!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups cooked shredded chicken
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 cup enchilada sauce
  • 8 small tortillas
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
  2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add shredded chicken, cumin, salt, and pepper.
  3. Warm the tortillas in the microwave for about 30 seconds to make them pliable.
  4. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture, roll them up, and place them seam-side down in a baking dish.
  5. Pour enchilada sauce over the top and sprinkle with shredded cheese.
  6. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

item.title: Garlic Butter Cheeseburger Rollups
item.description: These Garlic Butter Cheeseburger Rollups are the perfect blend of comfort and fun, transforming classic cheeseburger flavors into a shareable, cheesy delight. With gooey cheese and a golden crust, they are sure to be a hit at any gathering.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 35 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 6

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 lb ground beef
  • 1 tsp garlic powder
  • 1 tsp onion powder
  • Salt & pepper, to taste
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
  • 1 package refrigerated pizza dough
  • 2 Tbsp butter, melted
  • 1 clove garlic, minced

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) or according to your dough package.
  2. Cook beef in a skillet until browned. Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Drain excess grease.
  3. Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface. Sprinkle cheddar evenly across.
  4. Spoon beef over cheddar, then sprinkle mozzarella on top.
  5. Roll dough into a log, pinching seam to seal.
  6. Brush with melted garlic butter.
  7. Place seam-side down on a baking sheet lined with parchment.
  8. Bake 18–20 minutes, until golden. Rest 5 minutes, then slice and serve hot.

item.title: Chicken Enchiladas with Sour Cream White Sauce
item.description: Indulge in these creamy, cheesy Chicken Enchiladas with Sour Cream White Sauce that are bursting with flavor. Perfect for a cozy dinner, these enchiladas are sure to become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 8

📊 Difficulty: Medium

🥘 Ingredients

  • 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
  • 8 flour tortillas
  • 2 cups sour cream
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 can green chilies
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix shredded chicken, green chilies, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture, roll them up, and place them seam-side down in a baking dish.
  4. In another bowl, combine sour cream and half of the shredded cheese, then pour over the enchiladas.
  5. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden.

item.title: Hamburger Stew
item.description: This Hamburger Stew is a comforting and hearty dish that combines the rich flavors of ground beef with vegetables in a savory broth. Perfect for a cozy dinner, it's both easy to make and satisfying to eat.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 potatoes, cubed
  • 4 cups beef broth
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add chopped onion and sauté until translucent.
  3. Stir in ground beef and cook until browned.
  4. Add carrots, potatoes, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
  5. Pour in beef broth and bring to a boil.
  6. Reduce heat and let simmer for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.

📌 Pinterest Tags: #cat1761230383494 #easyrecipe #1hourmeals #recipe #cooking #foodie #homemade #delicious #pound #olive #onion

item.title: Mongolian Ground Beef Noodles
item.description: Discover the bold flavors of Mongolian cuisine with these savory ground beef noodles. Combining tender beef, flavorful sauce, and perfectly cooked noodles, this dish is quick to prepare and packed with rich, aromatic spices.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 8 ounces noodles
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon oyster sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sesame oil
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon ginger, minced
  • 1 bell pepper, sliced
  • 2 green onions, chopped
  • Salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the noodles according to package instructions, then drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium heat and add garlic and ginger, sautéing until fragrant.
  3. Add ground beef to the skillet, cooking until browned and fully cooked.
  4. Stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, bell pepper, and cooked noodles, mixing well to combine.
  5. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, allowing flavors to meld, then season with salt and pepper to taste.
  6. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

item.title: Italian Sausage Bow Tie Pasta
item.description: This Italian Sausage Bow Tie Pasta is a weeknight wonder that combines tender pasta with savory sausage in a creamy sauce. It's quick, easy, and utterly irresistible, making it the perfect dish for busy evenings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 12 ounces bow tie pasta
  • 1 pound Italian sausage, casings removed
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh basil for garnish

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook bow tie pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add the Italian sausage, breaking it apart with a spoon.
  3. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
  4. Add minced garlic and cook for an additional minute until fragrant.
  5. Stir in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
  6. Add grated Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and combined.
  7. Toss the cooked pasta with the sauce, seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
  8. Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil.

item.title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
item.description: Indulge in the simplicity and bold flavors of Pasta Aglio e Olio, a classic Italian dish that comes together in just minutes. With garlic, olive oil, and a hint of spice, this dish is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a cozy gathering with friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 15 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 30 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 400g spaghetti
  • 6 cloves garlic, minced
  • 100ml olive oil
  • dried red chili flakes
  • fresh parsley, chopped
  • salt and pepper to taste

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente.
  2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant but not browned.
  3. Add the dried chili flakes and chopped parsley to the skillet, stirring to combine.
  4. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet, tossing well to coat the pasta in the garlic oil mixture.
  5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve immediately.
